job_description:
- Willing to travel out of town.
- Proficient in office software such as Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and document management systems.
- Skilled in managing complex schedules, including handling business trips, meetings, and multilingual communication for international coordination.
- Able to efficiently organize multiple tasks, such as coordinating correspondence, processing documents, and maintaining filing systems.
- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
- Detail-oriented, with strong attention to accuracy to prevent errors in scheduling and documentation.
- Able to work effectively and remain calm under pressure.
- Maintain strict confidentiality of sensitive company and personal information of the CEO.
- Proactive and initiative-driven, anticipating the CEOâ€™s needs and taking action without constant supervision.
- Ethical, polite, professional, and reliable.
- Fluent in English (active proficiency).
